properties.title: R %VER% for Mac OS X 10.5 or higher (Leopard build)

pkmkdoc.description: R %VER% for Mac OS X 10.5 (Leopard) and higher. This package contains universal, Leopard build of R (both 32-bit and 64-bit). This package includes the R %VER% framework and R GUI %GUIVER%.

choice.title: R %VER% Framework
choice.description: R framework version %VER% (universal 32-bit and 64-bit) for Mac OS X 10.5 (Leopard) or higher. This package contains the full framework necessary for the use of R on Intel and PowerPC Macs.

choice.title: R GUI %GUIVER% (32-bit)
choice.tooltip: R for Mac OS X GUI %GUIVER% Application 32-bit
choice.description: This is the Mac GUI application for R (32-bit version). It requires a compatible R framework to be installed as well.

choice.title: R GUI %GUIVER% (64-bit)
choice.tooltip: R for Mac OS X GUI %GUIVER% Application 64-bit
choice.description: This is the Mac GUI application for R (64-bit version). It requires a compatible R framework to be installed as well.
